home.title: Discover Your Happiness Score
home.subtitle: A scientific assessment based on objective indicators to measure your life satisfaction and well-being
home.description: Our happiness calculator evaluates your life satisfaction through 6 key dimensions: economic strength, social status, health condition, assets, family situation, and personal habits. Get your personalized happiness report now!

features.objectiveDesc: Based on quantifiable data, not subjective feelings
features.personalizedDesc: Generate beautiful poster with your happiness score

survey.title: Happiness Assessment
survey.keyboardHint: Use keyboard arrow keys for quick navigation

levelDescriptions.winner: Congratulations! You have achieved excellence in multiple life dimensions and enjoy a very high level of happiness.
levelDescriptions.successful: Great! You have good performance in most areas and maintain a high quality of life.
levelDescriptions.middle: Not bad! You have a stable life foundation with room for improvement in some areas.
levelDescriptions.ordinary: You have basic life security but there's significant room for improvement in happiness.
levelDescriptions.struggling: Don't give up! Focus on improving key areas to enhance your overall happiness.

countrySelector.coefficientDescription: This coefficient adjusts your economic indicators based on local cost of living.
